info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:10PM CDT until July 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN UNION...PULASKI...MASSAC...WESTERN POPE...SOUTHERN JOHNSON...NORTHERN BALLARD AND NORTHWESTERN MCCRACKEN COUNTIES... At 309 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dongola to near Mound City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paducah, Metropolis, Vienna, Brookport, Mounds, Dongola, Tamms, Mound City, Karnak, Dixon Springs, New Columbia, Ullin, Joppa, Olmsted, Cypress, New Grand Chain, Pulaski, Belknap, Eddyville and Mill Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 2. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 12 and 38. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 5 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
